item.title: [Python] I hit the API with python client of echonest
item.description: What is #echonest The Echo Nest, a database of music information, seems to have been acquired by Spotify in 2014. The music information API is open to the public. http://the.echonest.com/ #echonest public library http://developer.echonest.com/client_libraries.html Tried environment Centos 7.2 Python 2.7 This time I tried using Pyechonest #Pyechonest installation easy_install -U pyechonest #Get API key http://developer.echonest.com/ Create a free account here. You will receive an email confirmation that your account has been activated.
